summary: CBBE ver of the Nocturnal Ghost Clothes by zuluknob
descriptionHtml:
Updated to be compatible with CBBE v3 with BBP. REQUIRES: CHSBHC (skeleton and animation files) and CBBE v3 (body textures; or you can use an alternate) to be installed.

This mod is based on the Nocturnal Ghost Clothes mod by zuluknob. I wanted a CBBE version of it and thus did a simple conversion to the meshes by teals03.

I take no credit for this mod as it was a really simple modification to the meshes already done by Caliente, CherryHotaling, killerkeo and teals03.

WHAT IT DOES?
Makes the default Nocturnal robes transparent and glowy. Optional file replaces the wedding dress which you can give yourself by using the console:
~
player.additem 88956 1

If you want to replace any other clothes/armors, for example, you want all glass armor worn by females to look like these clothes instead, you simply have to do the following steps:
1. Create a \" meshes / armor / glass / f / \" folder if you do not have 1 already.
2. Copy \"outfitf_0.nif\" and \"outfitf_1.nif\" into that folder.
3. Rename both of those copied files to \"cuirass_0.nif\" and \"cuirass_1.nif\" respectively. 

It is simply knowing the correct folders and the file names to copy and rename them to if you want to replace any other armor\'s looks.
Reference:
meshes / armor / daedric / daedrictorsof_0.nif
meshes / armor / dragonbone / dragonbonearmorf_0.nif
meshes / armor / dragonscale / dragonscalearmorf_0.nif
meshes / armor / glass / f / cuirass_0.nif
meshes / clothes / mageapprentice / mageapprenticerobesf_0.nif
meshes / clothes / magejourneyman / magejourneymanrobesf_0.nif
meshes / clothes / archmage / f / archmagerobesf_0.nif

INSTALLATION
Standard. Extract the files to your skyrim folder, override where applicable. This mod only uses meshes. If you already have another nocturnal mod which installed textures into \"textures\\clothes\\nocturnal\", you may have to delete those or the results would be interesting.

You also require the CHSBHC mod to be installed with a CBBEv3 texture (original or alternate).

UNINSTALLATION
Delete \"meshes\\clothes\\nocturnal\\\" or \"meshes\\clothes\\weddingdress\\\"

CHANGE LOG
8/2/2012 - Updated for CBBE v3 with BBP
15/12/2011 - Updated to be compatible with CBBE v0.2

CREDITS
zuluknob - for the original idea and instructions on how to do it (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1613)
Caliente - for the body meshes (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2676)
CherryHotaling - for the CHSBHC breast physics (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888)
killerkeo - for the original nocturnal mod for CBBE v2 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654)
teals03 - for the update to killerkeo\'s mod to CBBE v3 and enabled pyhsics (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7629)
author: Ryhpez
